name: Wild Dinosaur Espace
description:
Most thrilling game with racing drifting action and adventure, you have to be careful dinosaurs can catch and destroy your racing car. The ultimate insane thrilling off road Dino racing car is endless drive 4x4 cruiser jeep drift rally and buggy car in the world of dinosaurs.

Features:
-Different Sports and buggy cars to choose
-Race against dinosaurs in Dino park environment
-Thrilling Off-road racing 4x4 jeep drifting
-Smooth and realistic car handling in vast Dino world
